data.actual_result: No sort is applied at all
data.expected_result: Should either be sorted from last to first visited server (that would make more sense), alternatively they can be sorted alphabetically or by the same order they are in main server list
data.short_description: When you type the asterisk symbol in Quick Switcher, the server list is sorted in a random order
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Quick Switcher  - Input an asterisk - Observe server list
